TestCaseMetaData.name: Final result to Amended header
TestCaseMetaData.Description: The LIS system creates and delivers an electronic lab result message to the EHR-S. This test plan is designed to test the EHR-S' capability to process the progression from a "final" to "amended" report.
TestCaseMetaData.PreCondition: Patient information is pre-loaded in the EHR-S. No other Pre-Condition.
TestCaseMetaData.PostCondition: The test message information received by the EHR-S has been incorporated with the patient's record.
TestCaseMetaData.TestObjectives: Demonstrate ability to import and incorporate a final and amended results message.
TestCaseMetaData.Notes: Use of the amended result status code 'A" is permitted, so this test case constitutes an optional test case, should partners agree to support this concept.
